snippet: Egypt said it brokered a 72-hour pause, and the Israelis appeared to be moving toward a conclusion to the nearly month-old conflict in Gaza.
abstract: Israel moves to wind down operations in Gaza, with claims it has achieved most of its military objectives; Israel is also feeling pressure by Western allies to stop inflicting civilian casualties in region; Egyptian-brokered cease-fire is announced.
lead_paragraph: Egypt said it brokered a 72-hour pause, and the Israelis appeared to be moving toward a conclusion to the nearly month-old conflict in Gaza.

headline.main: Israel Moves to Wrap Up Gaza Military Operation
headline.print_headline: Israel Moves to Wrap Up Gaza Military Operation
